@All
On another note , are  we also  aligned with MOH  once you procure the product? as donations apparantly has to go through them. I don't know the regulation but that is what I heard.

But the food provider should maintain good hygiene and also when recieving payment has to be careful in general.

text:
<@U011870MD54> most of the Kebele have now enforced that they create a barrier between buyer and seller so most shops have been tieing ropes at their entrance and have a person by the cash register and a person receiving orders . The best shop I’ve seen so far which is a Baltena is by Bole medhaniyalem they have the rope barrier but also have a tray covered in plastic were you drop your money to then the cashier is the only one allowed to collect it from you three workers stand and wait to take your order and they do not allow more than five people to get into the shop at once. 
As for food being contaminated by corona we have been advised to avoid eating raw vegetables so no salads of any kind everything has to get heated up but not sure if the mass is following that. People have also been asked to wear gloves when shopping or have to clean hands before and after shopping.

elements.text: most of the Kebele have now enforced that they create a barrier between buyer and seller so most shops have been tieing ropes at their entrance and have a person by the cash register and a person receiving orders . As for food being contaminated by corona we have been advised to avoid eating raw vegetables so no salads of any kind everything has to get heated up but not sure if the mass is following that. People have also been asked to wear gloves when shopping or have to clean hands before and after shopping.

text: Hello all! thank you for inviting me to join your project. After discussing with Ruth, I looked through the documents I have... so I again start with more questions. WHO has a good and simple guide. I can attach a link..but who am I aiming this document for? Instead of copying the whole document, would it be useful if I gather the summary and post it? Are you planning to give training for Chefs? or give them written document? Do we want it in amharic? Is there a specific production site, do we know what this site has in terms of resources/ trained staff? storage? Transport/service?

elements.text: Hello all! thank you for inviting me to join your project. After discussing with Ruth, I looked through the documents I have... so I again start with more questions. Are you planning to give training for Chefs? or give them written document? Do we want it in amharic? Is there a specific production site, do we know what this site has in terms of resources/ trained staff? storage? Transport/service?

text:
Hi Zelalem - thanks for joining. We have two plans in motion here that could require your expertise.
1. Identifying meals that can be cooked by restaurants for delivery to quarantine centers
2. Identify goods to include in grocery care package being sent to families in need

elements.text: Hi Zelalem - thanks for joining. We have two plans in motion here that could require your expertise.
Identifying meals that can be cooked by restaurants for delivery to quarantine centers
Identify goods to include in grocery care package being sent to families in need

text: For the meals, we will want a handful of ideas (recipes might not be necessary) for different nutritional meals that can be sent to those in quarantine centers. Just a breakdown of the food included in each meal - we are beginning with the plan of 2 meals per day, so maybe a list of ~8-10 different meals that can be used over the course of a week. We can probably use certain meals multiple times in a week. The production site will be the restaurant we choose to work with - we will be sending out a RFP (request for proposal) to identify which restaurants we want to work with based on their available resources, price, etc. Once we know which restaurant(s) we're working with, I'll handle organizing the delivery

elements.text: For the meals, we will want a handful of ideas (recipes might not be necessary) for different nutritional meals that can be sent to those in quarantine centers.
